question: 141. To which of the following does an internet gateway attach?
options: D. An instance within a subnet
B. A subnet within a VPC

question: 142. Which of the following destination routes would be used for routing IPv4 traffic to an internet gateway?
143. Which of the following destination routes would be used for routing IPv6 traffic to an internet gateway?
144. Which of the following is not necessary for an instance to have IPv6 communication over the Internet?
options: C. A subnet with an associated IPv6 CIDR block
B. A public IPv6 assigned to the instance
D. A virtual private gateway with IPv6 enabled
A. A VPC with an associated IPv6 CIDR block
answers: D. A virtual private gateway with IPv6 enabled

question: 145. Which of the following are possible options for assigning to an instance that needs public access? (Choose two.)
146. Which of the following will have internet gateways available? (Choose two.)
options: B. An IPv6 elastic IP address

question: 147. What does ALB stand for?
148. At what OSI layer does an application load balancer operate?
149. At what OSI layer does a network load balancer operate?
150. At what OSI layer does a classic load balancer operate?
151. Which type of load balancer operates at the Transport layer?
options: D. Both classic and network load balancers
answers: D. Both classic and network load balancers

question: 152. Which type of load balancer operates at the Application layer?
options: D. Both classic and application load balancers
answers: D. Both classic and application load balancers

question: 153. What type of subnets are the default subnets in the default VPC?
154. What type of subnets are the default subnets in a custom VPC?
155. Which of the following is not automatically created for an instance launched into a nondefault subnet?
options: D. A route to other instances in the subnet

question: 156. Which of the following would be needed to allow an instance launched into a non-default subnet Internet access? (Choose two.)
157. Which of the following would you need to add or create to allow an instance launched into a default subnet in the default VPC Internet access?
158. Which of the following would you use to allow outbound Internet traffic while preventing unsolicited inbound connections?
159. What does a NAT device allow?
options: A. Incoming traffic from the Internet to reach private instances
B. Incoming traffic from other VPCs to reach private instances
C. Outgoing traffic to other VPCs from private instances
D. Outgoing traffic to the Internet from private instances
answers: D. Outgoing traffic to the Internet from private instances

question: 160. Which of the following are NAT devices offered by AWS? (Choose two.)
